body.p:
North Middletown
Bourbon Co Ky
Decr 4. 1860
To his Excellency
Beriah Magoffin
Govenor of Ky.
I hereby tender my resignation as Justice of the Peace for said county in District No. 4. & Recommend William R Gorham as a fit & suitable person to fill my place.
we citizens of said Precinct also endorse the Recommendation of said Harris

B. F. Hart
J B Rankins
Joseph Scott
